item.description:
At this meeting, we will discuss the implications of a CEO Intelligence Briefing which will be distributed to the members who sign up to participate. Whether you are in small business or work for larger organizations, this meeting will be of great interest in learning how current events are affecting or will affect you and your business.
In addition, a special guest will be invited to discuss one aspect of management such as Financing or Marketing.
Hope we can get a good turnout.
item.name: CEO Intelligence Briefing and Discussion
